text: “Nena: “Kodi ndifune mbuye wina kusiya Allah, pomwe Iye ndi Mbuye wa chinthu chilichonse? Ndipo mzimu uliwonse siuchita choipa koma ukudzichitira wokha. Mzimu wosenza machimo siudzasenza machimo a mzimu wina. Kenako kobwerera kwanu (nonse) ndi kwa Mbuye wanu, (Allah), ndipo adzakuuzani zomwe mudali kusiyana.”
